roleset.name: cause defeat in by terminating employment or otherwise pillaging/ conquering
roleset.note: SACK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls fire-10.10. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sack.01-v)
SACKING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from sacking.01-n)

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: First , he unceremoniously sacked Tom Landry , the legendary coach who [*T*-1] took the Cowboys to five Super Bowls and 20 consecutive winning seasons .
example.arg: Tom Landry , the legendary coach who [*T*-1] took the Cowboys to five Super Bowls and 20 consecutive winning seasons

example.name: Conquer
example.text: Berlin-1 was sacked *-1 and thousands of German women raped by the Red Army in 1945.
